title: MUFG doubles down on DMI Finance investment with $334 million bet
description: The investment was made through its consolidated subsidiary MUFG Bank and brings the total investment by MUFG in DMI Finance to Rs 4712 crores (approximately $565 million) adding to the $400 millon that MUFG invested in the company last April.
